snippet: As President Obama heads to Ohio and Virginia on Saturday to "kick off" his re-election campaign, it seems a curiosity to remember that it has been 20 years since an incumbent president formally "announced" his intent to run for a second term.
abstract: As President Obama heads to Ohio and Virginia on Saturday to "kick off" his re-election campaign, it seems a curiosity to remember that it has been 20 years since an incumbent president formally "announced" his intent to run for a second term.

headline.main: Surprise! A President Runs for Re-Election
